name: brawlRefugeeObjects
description:
Modified Refugee Town objects used by template Brawl, should be better suited for short games on small maps.
Daevas Bank:
30% chance: 3x1 Genie, 2x1 Efreet, reward: -7 Gold, 2 Genies, level 4 Spell,
30% chance: 3x2 Genies, 2x1 Efreet, reward: -77 Gold, 1 Efreet, level 5 Spell,
30% chance: 3x1 Genie, 2x2 Efreeti, reward: -777 Gold, 1 Efreet, 2 Genies, level 5 Spell,
10% chance: 3x2 Genies, 2x2 Efreeti, reward: -7777 Gold, 1 Daeva, level 5 Spell,
always gives 7 Gems, Mercury and Crystals.
Daeva creature weakened: Health and Regeneration down 10 times, Damage and Magic Damage down 5 times, Attack, Defense and Speed halved, level down to 7, fight value, ai value and gold cost down 10 times, resource cost down to 1.
All creatures that have upgrades, both guards and rewards have a chance of being upgraded.
All banks recharge after 4 full days pass.
They are not designed to be taken with your whole army but with parts of your army in multiple places at once.
author: Warzyw647
